DOC.brief_summary: This study aim achieve long-term weight loss T2DM patient use comprehensive lifestyle change program , provide patient structured diet , exercise plan , group behavioral support group education . Additionally study design establish reduction body weight lead improvement glycemic lipid metabolism , also reduce blood pressure level . The study also direct show lifestyle change program T2DM patient lead decrease hospitalization rate healthcare consumption . In order demonstrate change standard care , data collect parallel cohort center .
DOC.brief_title: Interventional Study Active Weight Management Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Obesity Routine Clinical Practice During 12 Months .
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent . Written informed consent must obtain assessment perform . •≥ 18 year Type 2 diabetes The Body Mass Index 28 40 kg/m^2 Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman , pregnancy define state female conception termination gestation . Type 1 diabetes Proliferative retinopathy Renal impairment : serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL , creatinine clearance < 40 ml/min and/or proteinuria The lack ability perform physical exercise due orthopedic cardiovascular disorder Chronic alcoholism , acute alcoholic intoxication
